column4: FTP noob here:  Is there a way to log into an FTP server without using a firefox add-on like fireFTP ??
the 'ftp' command on the commandline or the gftp gui
that's for incoming packets, but only for services that use that file (read: it's practically useless)
yes. But you need to mount -o remount,rw / first though :)
avoid using backticks. They don't nest :)
gpasswd or useradd are easier to remember ;)
yeah, I had to look that one up
aptitude  and apt-get cache are in /etc/apt/  ?
aptitude has its own cache in ~/.aptitude. The general apt cache is in /var/cache/apt and /var/lib/apt
